group_1.textRight: A film about historical Kamihama?@That sounds so cool!

group_1.textLeft: And so the only snag left in the plan...

group_1.textRight: In that case...@why not film it with just Magical Girls?

group_1.textLeft: I can totally make room in my schedule to help out!@It sounds like a lot of fun!

group_1.textRight: ...she can probably introduce you to lots of other@Magical Girls too!

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.@We do happen to be acquainted with Yakumo.
So all we'd have to do is put out a call at the@Coordinator's shop...

group_1.textCenter: That means it'd be an all-girl cast, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes. A sort of 'Kamihamasiennes' arrangement,@if you will.

group_1.textCenter: It'll be a fundamental change to the plan,@but...[chara:303901:lipSynch_0]...[wait:1.5][chara:303901:lipSynch_1][chara:303901:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json][chara:303901:cheek_0][chara:303901:motion_1][chara:303901:eyeClose_0]No, you're right! This can work!
In that case, will the role of our handsome young@fianc√© also be played by a Magical Girl...?

group_1.textRight: Remind me how tall you are?
Mihono, what do you say to casting Komachi in@the lead role?
